00013 #define GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00014    KeyStrokeField * variable; \
00015    if ((variable = new KeyStrokeField) == NULL) \
00016       throw EOUTOFMEMORY; \
00017    if (area != NULL) \
00018       ((FieldsArea *) area)->appendField(variable); \
00019    if (groupField != NULL) \
00020       ((GroupField *) groupField)->appendField(variable);
00021 
00022 #define GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD_P(variable, area, groupField, px, py) \
00023    GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00024    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00025 
00026 #define GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD_S(variable, area, groupField, width, height) \
00027    GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00028    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00029       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00030 
00031 #define GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD_PS(variable, area, groupField, px, py, width, height) \
00032    GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00033    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00034    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
00035       (height) >= 0 ? (height) : variable->getSize().y));
00036 
00037 #define GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD_M(variable, area, groupField, minimumWidth, minimumHeight) \
00038    GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00039    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00040    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00041 
00042 #define GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD_PM(variable, area, groupField, px, py, minimumWidth, minimumHeight) \
00043    GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00044    variable->moveTo(Vector((px), (py))); \
00045    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00046    variable->resizeToMinimum();
00047 
00048 #define GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD_SM(variable, area, groupField, width, height, minimumWidth, minimumHeight) \
00049    GLAZIERY_KEYSTROKEFIELD(variable, area, groupField) \
00050    variable->setMinimumSize(Vector(minimumWidth, minimumHeight)); \
00051    variable->resize(Vector((width) >= 0 ? (width) : variable->getSize().x, \
